message.body: Hi Jeremy and Kennedy! It's Luiza, the Brazilian girl that sent you a message last week on couchsurfing. Sorry for getting back to you so late. I had som
e problems with internet in the middle of my trip. I was just wondering if you are still willing to host me or if you changed your plans. Let me know. :)
Hey Luiza! We can host you! When do you arrive?
Great! :) I'm in Washington right now. I was planning on catching the greyhound bus at 5:20pm. I would arrive there at around 8:30pm. Is that okay with you?
Awesome. I'll send you a message when I get on the bus! See you soon!
I'm on the bus. I should be in Philadelphia soon. :) Luiza
Hey guys. Just to let you know that I just got home. :) Luiza
K! We will be out late
We're at our studio if you feel like coming over, it's at front and girard
If you need to turn the a/c on, just turn the dial next to the fridge above the couch
Okay. I think I'll end up staying here. I bought some food so I think I'll just eat, relax and wait for you here. Haha
